mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info(user_id, user_name, avatart_url, password, email, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{avatarUrl}, #{password}, #{email}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET status = #{status} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user_info SET user_name = #{userName}, avatart_url = #{avatarUrl}, email = #{email} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_code FROM user_role ur JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
